title: Riot took my name and gave it to someone else, LOL!
body:
Heyo, 

I dont know if its normal, but i didnt play for a while (school etc), thats why im Level 5. After i logged in today, i got a completely different name as you can see. I mean seriously, if im inactive in other games they dont change my name just someone else want it. 

Does anyone know what to do in this case? I sent a support request, but i dont think they will do anything.

wtf is that?

replies.body:
As part of our [**Summoner Name Cleanup**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-), Summoner names go up for grabs after you've become inactive for a while. Each account is given a period of time where their summoner name is protected from cleanup, but this time period depends on the summoner level of the account. An account under level 5 is granted **6 months** of protection, after which the summoner name is up for grabs for any player that spend the RP to purchase the name.

I hope this cleared up the confusion, please let me know if you have any questions that aren't answered after browsing through our [**Summoner Name Cleanup FAQ.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-)
